examples.description: returns an array of all articles
examples.full_description: Articles GET /articles returns an array of all articles
Articles GET /articles/:id with one pageviews returns the correct article

examples.description: uses the session to keep track of the number of page views

Articles GET /articles/:id with three pageviews returns the correct article

examples.description: uses the session to keep track of the number of page views
examples.full_description: Articles GET /articles/:id with three pageviews uses the session to keep track of the number of page views
Articles GET /articles/:id with more than three pageviews returns an error message
Articles GET /articles/:id with more than three pageviews returns a 401 unauthorized status
